idea-plugin.name: Code Time Tracker
idea-plugin.description:
A JetBrains Platform plugin that automatically tracks your coding time and provides comprehensive analytics to help you understand your development patterns and improve productivity.

  • Data Management - Export and import your tracking data in JSON format for backup or migration
